item.description:
Lake Dennison Recreation Area is a lovely park and campground in Winchendon, MA. It is also home to a small abandoned cemetery that is reputed to be haunted.

Come join me for a cookout and investigation. We can figure out who can bring what for an informal cookout after I get an idea of who can come.

The location offers picnic tables, a beach, and campsites. I've reserved campsites so that we can stay as late as we want to.

When:

Sunday, August 29, 5pm to 10pm (beginning of quiet time)

Where: Lake Dennison Recreation Area
Directions: http://www.mass.gov/d...
Park in public parking near the picnic tables and beach

What to bring: Chairs, hibachis, charcoal, cookout food and drink (I'll send out a signup sheet for those interested in coming), flashlight, bug repellant, investigation equipment

What NOT to bring: alcohol (not allowed on site), firewood (we can buy it there but not bring it in--you'll be fined)

I look forward to seeing you there!
item.name: Cookout and cemetery investigation
